channel.title: Workplace Management on PlaceOS
channel.description: Recent content in Workplace Management on PlaceOS

item.title: WorkMate
item.description: The first workplace management system to combine out-of-the-box simplicity with enterprise-level configuration & scalability

item.title: StageHand
item.description: Control every AV device in every room on campus — from your browser

item.title: BackOffice
item.description: Command your entire smart environment in one place

item.title: Occupancy Monitoring System
item.description: A self-hosted occupancy monitoring system that works with the infrastructure you already have — no new sensors needed.

item.title: Visitor Management
item.description: Visitor management software so simple, the only thing you do is send the invite, it does everything else

item.title: Building & Region-Level Workplace Management
item.description: Control workplace settings to standardize policies across buildings, so you can scale workplace management while ensuring the right settings for each location.

item.title: December 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: December 2024 WorkMate updates include new parking utilization reports, kiosk customizations, recurring desk bookings, added language support and room alerts.

item.title: How to Choose the Best Meeting Room Booking Software
item.description: Learn how to select the best meeting room booking software. Explore common challenges, scalability concerns & the unique benefits of PlaceOS.

item.title: New Feature: Locking Booking
item.description: Explore PlaceOS’s Locker Booking System: Easy reservations, access control, visual booking, and flexibility for workplaces and visitor management.

item.title: Downsizing Your Office? First, Take These 5 Essential Steps
item.description: Today’s work environment has seen dramatic shifts, prompting many companies to consider downsizing their office spaces.

item.title: July 2024 PlaceOS Product Updates
item.description: Non-bookable rooms now show real-time status, desk height management for Floorsense desks, and real-time parking availability.

item.title: Indoor Wayfinding for your Workplace
item.description: Enhance workplace navigation with indoor wayfinding technology. Explore how these solutions can streamline movement and boost productivity in your office.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Concierge - Managing Workplace Experience
item.description: Elevate your hybrid workplace with our advanced workplace management app. Discover how to enhance the workplace experience and streamline operations.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: WorkMate Native iOS & Android
item.description: Discover Workmate, the ultimate workplace management app for iOS and Android. Join our live demo to see how it enhances productivity and streamlines tasks.

item.title: Managing Technology Redundancy in IoT and Smart Buildings
item.description: Learn how to effectively deal with technology redundancy in IoT and smart buildings. Discover strategies to optimize systems and ensure continuous performance.

item.title: Smart Building Data traps
item.description: Learn how to spot deceit in smart building data and understand analytics better. Protect your business from misinformation with these expert tips.

item.title: Workplace Management App: New Features and Enhancements
item.description: Explore the new features of the refreshed Concierge workplace management app. Improve efficiency and optimize your workplace with our innovative solutions.

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Indoor Wayfinding & Workplace Management Overhaul
item.description: A brand new feature powered by a new integration. An overhaul of our workplace management application.

item.title: A guide to digital workplace transformation
item.description: A recent Gartner Report shows that your digital transformation journey will be a dead end unless you do this.

item.title: Approaching workplace optimization
item.description: The sales funnel has a pretty well-defined approach. Instead of using that to sell more products, how can we build better UX?

item.title: LIVE DEMO: Understanding Energy Analytics, Surveys & Catering
item.description: A live demo about technical details behind our energy analytics tools, valuable insights from surveys & our catering tool.
